name: Broken Crown
flavor: Eliksni songs still tell of Chelchis, Kell of Stone, who stood before the Maw.

name: Flamel Crest
flavor: Anything can be anything else, if only you will it so.

name: Hourless Glass
flavor: The sand in this seemingly ancient timepiece will not move, no matter which way you turn it.

name: Leaf of the Bleeding Tree
flavor: Eat not of the fruit of this tree.

name: Light of Moths
flavor: In the Hive's ontoformic reality, this glow is the manifestation of bound, dying souls.

name: Numinous Web
flavor: A web spun from the flayed and frozen Light of Guardians lost.

name: Oddly Colored Cube
flavor: Gallida died to bring these cubes back from Venus and I still don't know why." —Despoina Kore

name: Ring of Living Stone
flavor: "In memory of the Deep Stone Crypt, the tower where we were born."

name: Segoth's Head
flavor: "Thought we formed the Banner to fight the Darkness, not ourselves. Just don't bode well, s'all I'm sayin'." —Gheleon

name: Silent Oracle
flavor: "Sometimes I swear I could hear it speaking, but I can never remember. I think it spoke of a name."

name: Sins of Kharad-Tan
flavor: For you are not the first hero—nor even Oryx the first villain—to meet upon this plane.

name: Sisyphus Project
flavor: "Clovis refuses to back down. Meanwhile, the others have taken to calling it 'the Sisyphus Project'…" — laboratory notes found at a Clovis Bray facility

name: Skorri's Dirge
flavor: They say she's apart from the Iron Banner, yet she sings songs of her lost companions.

name: Specimen Twelve
flavor: Running hot with the effort of simulating not one group of scientists, but two hundred and twenty-seven.

name: Spectral Dust
flavor: A sample of the mysterious particulate that protects and hides the Reef from invaders.

name: Techeun Bangle
flavor: An approximation of the glittering augments worn by the Queen of the Awoken's advisors.

name: Thanatonaut's Lullaby
flavor: Makes the passage just that much easier.

name: The Damned Lute
flavor: "Hey nonny nonny, hey nonny nonny, be not blithe nor bonny..."

name: The Traitor's Die
flavor: Every roll of this die is already written into the fabric of Oryx's reality.

name: Tome of Nothing
flavor: The few who have claimed to see words on its seemingly blank pages have subsequently gone mad.

name: Transcendent Eye
flavor: "You are not the seer. Not yet. You are the one who is seen." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Warp Fragment
flavor: This piece of Golden Age technology is covered in particulate originating from beyond our solar system.

name: Weregilt
flavor: Even among the Hive, all death has its cost.

name: Whispering Sphere
flavor: You can't be sure, but you think you've seen Lord Shaxx speaking into a sphere just like this one.

name: Perfected SIVA Capsule
flavor: "SIVA destroyed the Iron Lords, but history need not repeat itself. Use it if you must. Even the most destructive tool, in the end, is a tool." —Tyra Karn

name: SIVA Capsule
flavor: This bundle of SIVA rests safely in a containment capsule. For now.

name: Colovance's Choice
flavor: "I will fight to stop the fighting. If that means I must die, then I choose death." —Lord Colovance

name: Oversoul's Gasp
flavor: The lingering echo of something that should have died long ago and far away.

name: Chronofuse
flavor: A piece of spacetime circuitry dislodged from the temporal stream.
